item.title: Suspicious people behind the barrier of empty lot., 3rd November
item.description:
No crime in action (yet), but at least 2 suspicious looking people with flashlights behind the barrier of an empty lot. They appear to be waiting for something.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Boord Street, Greenwich Peninsula, London

item.title: Blocking street light over zebra crossing, 3rd November
item.description:
Large trees are blocking a street light that is located to light a zebra crossing. As such the zebra crossing is very dark and difficult to see pedestrians at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 308, Erith Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nicky’s chippy rubbish, 3rd November
item.description:
Micky’s chippy’s rubbish is put on the corner of Pellerin and Boleyn Road. There is so much after Saturday night and it has been pulled apart by foxes and is all over the street. It’s completely disgusting. It’s been going on too long

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste, 3rd November
item.description:
The trees and bushes are full of full poo bags that have been purposely hung or thrown in them. I reported this problem last year, it seems someone has continued to persist in this disgusting habit.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dunkery Road, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Business being run on street, 3rd November
item.description:
Hi Mark Rigby did clear up the dumped cars on Wallhouse road but the trader in Slade Green Road has started up dumping them on the street again . I have reported to the Govnt website as well but because it is sorn I do not think they will do anything. Also if you have a contact there as the trader is misusing trade plates , they are not to be used to leave untaxed and MOT cars on the public highway. Also he unloads vehicles very early in the morning/late at night making lots of noise , who can I report this too please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wallhouse Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste on pavement, 3rd November
item.description:

item.title: Continual dumping of rubbish and recycling, 3rd November
item.description:
Continual dumping of rubbish and recycling bags, including food waste in general green sacks, at all times throughout the week, encouraging vermin and misuse by local vulnerable people who are going through the waste and strewing it throughout the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rowhill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant dumping of waste, 3rd November
item.description:
Waste and recycling dumped here on a daily basis. This is attracting vermin and further dumping throughout the local area and is becoming really serious.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Road, Hackney, London
